name: Overhaul (IronySheep)
description:
Updated 2019-11-15

Requires Mouse and Keyboard. Keybinding available.

DEFAULT CONTROLS

  • Accelerate: Up
  • Reverse: Down 
  • Steer: Left + Right 
  • Fire: C
  • Brake: X
  • Boost: Z
  • Shop: Space (only works when near home)

This is Overhaul, my Devtober project! Harvest minerals from asteroids with the help of your mining spaceship, then return home to sell the minerals and obtain credits for upgrades!
